headline: Should Cummins’ Earnings Beat, Dividend Hike and Insider Selling Require Action From Cummins (CMI) Investors?
summary: In February 2026, Cummins Inc. reported strong fourth-quarter results, declared a US$2.00 per share dividend for March, and presented at two major industrial conferences in Miami, while senior executives Amy Davis and Earl Newsome sold modest portions of their company stock holdings. The combination of an earnings beat, continued dividend payments, and increased analyst confidence highlights Cummins’ operational resilience even as insider selling activity draws attention. Against this...
